member.name: MFINPUTTRUSTAUTHORITY_ACCESS_ACTION
member.summary: Describes an action requested by an output trust authority (OTA). The request is sent to an input trust authority (ITA).

member.name: MFINPUTTRUSTAUTHORITY_ACCESS_ACTION.Action
member.summary: Specifies the action as a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFINPUTTRUSTAUTHORITY_ACCESS_ACTION.pbTicket
member.summary: Pointer to a buffer that contains a ticket object, provided by the OTA.

member.name: MFINPUTTRUSTAUTHORITY_ACCESS_ACTION.cbTicket
member.summary: Size of the ticket object, in bytes.
